pages.text: $(item)充能符文()有它的奇妙之處。當$(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)血之祭壇$()不在合成階段或灌注$(l:bloodmagic:altar/soul_network)氣血寶珠$()時；$(item)充能符文()將緩慢吸取LP，並充能在符文內。使你若在下次將物品放入$(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)血之祭壇$()且要合成時，它將會立刻將充能的LP一比一地轉換為合成所需的LP並瞬間注入物品當中。

The Blood Altar does a charging tick once per 20 in-game ticks, which is reduced by 1 per $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_rune/acceleration_rune)Acceleration Rune.$(/l)$(br)  The speed that the Blood Altar charges at per charging tick is: [10LP x $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_rune/charging_rune)Charging Runes$() x (1 + $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_rune/speed_rune)Speed Runes$()/10)] $(br)The maximum charge that a Blood Altar can hold is 1000LP per $(item)Charging Rune$(), which is then multiplied by: [(capacity of the main Blood Altar tank)/20000] if that value is above 1.
